extDesc.message: A simple and efficient proxy switching tool

form_name.message: Configuration name (do not use quotes, braces {} or other special characters)

form_useGlobalWhitelist.message: Use global whitelist (will be merged with rules below)

form_whitelist_placeholder.message:
Whitelist (one rule per line), supports comments with #:
# Corporate networks
*.company.com # Main domain
192.168.1.* # Local network
# CDN services
*.cdn.example.com

form_whitelist_hint.message: Websites matching whitelist rules will connect directly without using proxy. Supports domains, IP addresses, wildcards, and comments (# comment).

about_description.message: A simple and efficient proxy switching tool

about_long_description.message: ProxyFox is a Chrome extension designed to provide users with simple and efficient proxy configuration switching functionality similar to the classic SwitchyOmega tool. It is compatible with the latest Manifest V3 standard and offers multiple proxy configurations, global whitelist and proxy-specific whitelist management, one-click switching, complete import/export functionality, and clear status feedback.

feature_proxyTypes.message: Support for multiple proxy types (HTTP, HTTPS, SOCKS4, SOCKS5)

globalWhitelist_desc.message: Set global whitelist rules that apply to all proxy configurations with "Use Global Whitelist" checked.

globalWhitelist_placeholder.message:
Enter global whitelist rules here, one per line, supports comments with #:
# Local networks
192.168.*.*
10.0.0.* # Company VPN

# Common services
*.example.com # Main site
*.cdn.example.com # CDN

# Development
localhost # Local server
127.0.0.1

status_globalWhitelistSaved.description: Global whitelist save success status message

confirm_closeForm.message: Closing the form will lose all current input. Are you sure you want to close?
confirm_closeForm.description: Confirmation for closing form with changes

confirm_deleteProxy.message: Are you sure you want to delete this proxy configuration?

error_cannotDeleteSystemConfig.description: Error message when trying to delete a system configuration

status_languageChanged.message: Language changed, refreshing page to fully apply

languageSettings_title.description: Title of the language settings page

languageSettings_desc.message: Select your preferred interface language. The interface text will update immediately after switching languages.
languageSettings_desc.description: Description of the language settings page

languageSettings_hint.message: Click on a button above to switch language. Changes will take effect immediately and refresh the page.
languageSettings_hint.description: Hint text on the language settings page

feature_autoRefresh.message: Automatic page refresh after proxy switching

feature_i18n_languages.message: Support for multiple languages (Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean)

feature_bugfixes.message: Multiple bug fixes and performance improvements

https_proxy_warning.message: When using HTTPS proxy, if you encounter self-signed or untrusted certificates, Chrome will display certificate warnings. You need to add exceptions in Chrome's certificate settings.

https_help_link.description: Text for link to Chrome certificate settings

auth_hint.message: Username and password are for reference only. When using the proxy, Chrome will prompt you to enter credentials again.

whitelist_comment_help_title.description: Title for whitelist comment help section

whitelist_comment_help_desc.message: You can add comments to organize your whitelist rules:

whitelist_comment_help_line.message: # Full line comment - this entire line is ignored

whitelist_comment_help_inline.message: *.example.com # Inline comment - text after # is ignored

whitelist_comment_help_organize.message: Use comments to organize rules by category, add notes, or explain special cases.

feature_commentSupport.message: Added comment support in whitelist rules using # syntax

feature_enhancedWhitelist.message: Enhanced whitelist management with better organization

feature_improvedHelp.message: Added interactive help sections with examples

feature_betterUX.message: Improved user experience with enhanced documentation

feature_instantWhitelist.message: Fixed global whitelist not taking effect immediately after saving

feature_improvedConfiguration.message: Improved proxy configuration reapplication mechanism to ensure whitelist updates take effect immediately

domain_pattern_help_title.description: Domain pattern matching help section title

domain_pattern_help_desc.message: ProxyFox intelligently recognizes wildcard domain patterns, consistent with mainstream proxy extensions:

domain_pattern_help_wildcard.message: Matches both qq.com root domain and all subdomains (e.g., www.qq.com, mail.qq.com)

domain_pattern_help_example.message: Matches both gtimg.com root domain and all subdomains (e.g., mat1.gtimg.com, inews.gtimg.com)

domain_pattern_help_smart.message: ðŸ’¡ When you input *.domain.com, the system automatically adds domain.com rule to ensure the root domain also bypasses the proxy correctly.

feature_smartDomainExpansion.message: Implemented smart domain expansion feature, *.domain.com automatically matches root domain

feature_improvedPatternMatching.message: Improved domain matching logic, consistent with mainstream proxy extensions

feature_enhancedCompatibility.message: Enhanced user experience with detailed domain matching rule explanations
